front.title: Recommendations for Creating IANA-Maintained YANG Modules

abstract.t: This document provides a set of guidelines for YANG module authors related to the design of IANA-maintained modules. These guidelines are meant to leverage existing IANA registries and use YANG as another format to present the content of these registriesn when appropriate. This document updates RFC 8407 by providing additional guidelines for IANA-maintained modules. It does not change anything written in RFC 8407.
